link.title: Greeneview Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: April Regular Board Meeting will be held virtually on Tuesday, April 21st @ 6 PM (click for details)

img.alt: Marching Band in parade through Xenia in red, white, and blue uniforms
Librarian reads book to 2nd grade classroom in the library
students in 1st grade sitting in desks in a bright, colorful classroom
students in robotics are building VEX dinosaurs
classroom of students and staff working together on reading activities
students at desks and teacher in front of room in a 4th grade classroom
three students assembling and working to program robots in classroom
students in a science classroom working together on a robotics kit
Spanish 2 students collaborate in flexible learning space on couches, student desks, tables, and high-top tables
4th grade teacher reads aloud as the students follow along at their desks
High School girls wearing pink uniforms standing at attention for National Anthem

span.span: Our Mission is to provide our students with challenging work which nurtures their love of learning and prepares each one for productive citizenship.
Our Vision is to create a
Community of Learners, Community of Success...Today and Tomorrow
